title: Signature Skin Range Programme
tagline: Curated Skin Journeys for Real-World Glow
description: A bespoke 6–12 week programme blending peels, LED, boosters, and medical skincare to transform texture, tone, and clarity.
longDescription: Skin Range is our concierge skin overhaul. After a diagnostic ‘Skin MOT’ we custom-build a calendar of treatments—think enzyme or TCA peels, microneedling, LED, PN boosters, and at-home actives—all sequenced by Dr. Abbas and our lead medical facialist. The result? Fewer breakouts, tighter pores, calmer pigment, and the confidence that comes from having a plan (and a team) on your side.

overview.title: What’s Inside a Skin Range Plan?
overview.content: No two programmes look the same. We start with VISIA imaging and barrier testing, then curate a sprint of in-clinic treatments (chemical peels, microneedling, LED, PN or PRP boosters) plus medical-grade skincare and supplement support. Weekly check-ins keep you accountable while we tweak every detail around travel, events, or breakouts.
highlights: Homecare bag curated to your skin goals
SOS access to our skin team for flare-ups

howItWorks.title: The Skin Range Method
howItWorks.subtitle: Structure + science + support
howItWorks.content: We phase your plan into Reset (clean slate), Treat (target top concerns), and Future-Proof (lock in results). Expect thoughtful sequencing—no random peels—so your barrier thrives while glow builds.

beforeAfter.title: VI Peel Precision Plus
beforeAfter.subtitle: Achieve radiant skin with our most sought-after treatment
beforeAfter.disclaimer: The VI Peel Precision Plus. This medium-depth peel targets melanogenesis, effectively reducing the production of melanin at its source. By promoting rapid cell turnover, it unveils brighter, more even-toned skin, delivering noticeable results in just 7 days.
